name: Cute But Deadly
description:
Pick a side! 

Use the correct ammo type and pickup powerups to defeat waves of enemies.

If you experience performance issues on the Web version, please download the Windows version.

Gamepad Controls:

Move: Left Stick

Fire Direction: Right Stick

Fire: Right Trigger

KB+M: 

Move: WASD

Fire Direction: Mouse

Fire: Left Mouse Button
